Has anyone tried adapting the interface of an Ethereum dapp based on the connected wallet’s previous transactions?  For example, someone with $100k+ and lots of transactions in their wallet is very different from a first-time user. You could offer a deeper onboarding experience.

Actual use in the market reveals the evolving value proposition of an asset. It cannot reliably be defined in advance.  That's why $BTC isn't a P2P electronic cash system. It's digital gold.  And $ETH isn't just gas. It's programmable money.  Deal with it. 😘
